SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui
Class WPTheme

java.lang.Object
  com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.WPTheme

public final class WPTheme
extends java.lang.Object

Globally accessible color theme manager. A class containing all colors and the ability to set/ get the current theme color. Preference is saved to users file system so that all applications using this package have a unified preference.

Don't forget to declare WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission in your manifest file if you use the synchronized methods like setAccentColor.

Change log: Version 1.01

  • ThemeTask & Operation classes for responsiveness
Version 1.02
  • Using UTF-8 to encode files.
Version 1.03
  • Supports dark/ light theme preference.
Version 1.04
  • Externalized the accent colors to public constants.
Version 1.05
  • Added Unsynchronized methods which change the static value of the theme color without updating the file on the SD card. Use if your app manages its own preferences, does not use the WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission, or you do not want to synchronized preferences across apps.
Version 1.06
  • Added the ability to add additional accent colors.
  • Added WPTheme.OnThemeChangeListeners.

Since:
06-06-2012

Nested Class Summary
static interface WPTheme.OnThemeChangeListener
          Listener to be notified when the accent color or theme has changed.
Note: this should NOT be used by widgets to know when to change accent color/ theme unless it is necessary.
static class WPTheme.Operation
          Represents a file operation, in the context of WPTheme either a read/ write to the color preference file.
static class WPTheme.ThemeTask
          By moving the write operations of the color preference file to an AsyncTask responsiveness is improved and doing so no longer holds up the UI.

setThemeDarkUnsynchronized

public static final void setThemeDarkUnsynchronized(boolean isDark)
Sets the theme dark/ light without updating the synchronized saved file on the user's SD card. Call this method instead of setThemeDark if you store the preference locally in your own application.

setThemeColor

public static final boolean setThemeColor(int color)
Set the global theme color.

Parameters:
color - The new color to use for the theme.
Returns:
True if the color was set correctly, false if color was not one supported by themeColors, or if color is the current theme color.

setThemeDark

public static final boolean setThemeDark(boolean isDark)
Set whether the current theme is dark or light.

Parameters:
isDark - True if the current theme should be dark.
Returns:
True if the current themeDark was set correctly, false if they are already the same.

setDefaultThemeColor

public static final void setDefaultThemeColor()
Set the default theme preferences based on what is stored on the user's SD card. Call this method in the home/ root Activity of your application to ensure that preferences are synchronized, unless you opt to use your own method of storing preferences.
